page.title: 05AN EASSIE PUPIL'S LIFE
page.content: Our school is a two teacher rural school which has 27 pupils. The ages range from five to twelve years. Teachers of art,gym and music visit the school regularly. We have 6 weeks summer holidays, 2 weeks autumn holiday ( for potato harvesting) and we also have 1 week at Christmas and 2 weeks at Easter. At 8.35a.m.the mini-bus picks me up for school, which starts at 9.00a.m.. We work till 12.25p.m. with a 20 minute interval.The dinner break lasts for 1 hour.School closes at 3.45p.m. in the summer and 3.30p.m. in the winter, to allow everyone to get home safely before it is dark.
